scripts.check:frontend: npx -y --prefix frontend tsc -p frontend/tsconfig.json --noEmit || echo 'no frontend'
scripts.check: npm run check:user && npm run check:product && npm run check:order && npm run check:payment && npm run check:frontend
scripts.db:push-all: npx --prefix services/user prisma db push --accept-data-loss && npx --prefix services/product prisma db push --accept-data-loss && npx --prefix services/order prisma db push --accept-data-loss
scripts.test:all: npm run smoke && npm run test:e2e
